item.title: GDP & Renewable Energy Relationship: A First Data Science Project
item.description: Outline: In my first data science project, I delve into the potential relationship between a country’s GDP and the proportion of its energy derived from renewable sources. This study also investigates regional disparities in renewable energy trends from 1970 to 2018. Leveraging three datasets - GDP, energy consumption, and regional information - I aimed to answer key questions regarding this nexus. The outcomes will provide valuable insights into the correlation between economic growth and sustainable energy adoption, while also showcasing my early venture into the realm of data science.
